name: Super Shipper
description:
Summary:

You play as a hero known as the Shipper. You see a request for your assistance with a task, however, there seems to have been a mix up and the requester thought you were a skilled delivery worker instead of a experienced aquatic hero. Finding it difficult to refuse someone in need you decide to take the menial job of delivering mail and packages.

Instructions :

You must spend 5 days delivering packages throughout the small town. Locations that need to be delivered to are marked with the green signal and rise high into the sky which should help location the delivery spot. Once you have made all the deliveries, return to the Delivery Office in order to proceed to the next day

Controls:

W / A / S / D - Directional movment

Project Description:

Created using Unreal Engine 4 and C++. Project was completed by myself and open source assets listed below. This was a submission for the I Can't Draw (but I want to make a game) jam.

Sources:

Landscape Asset V2 by eracoon on OpenGameArt.org

Building Pack by flavio on OpenGameArt.org

RailJet/Long Seamless Loop by Deceased Superior Technician (DST) on OpenGameArt.org
